verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%>, A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>. The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6030>hear<s%> thee in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%>; the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7682>defend<s%> thee;
<S%H7971>Send<s%> thee <S%H5828>help<s%> from the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, and <S%H5582>strengthen<s%> thee out of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>;
<S%H5414>Grant<s%> thee according to thine own <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and <S%H4390>fulfil<s%> all thy <S%H6098>counsel<s%>.

We will <S%H7442>rejoice<s%> in thy <S%H3444>salvation<s%>, and in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%> we will set up our <S%H1713>banners<s%>: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4390>fulfil<s%> all thy <S%H4862>petitions<s%>.

Now <S%H3045>know<s%> I that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3467>saveth<s%> his <S%H4899>anointed<s%>; he will <S%H6030>hear<s%> him from his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> with the <S%H3468>saving<s%> <S%H1369>strength<s%> of his right <S%H3225>hand<s%>.
Some trust in <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and some in <S%H5483>horses<s%>: but we will <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>.
They are brought <S%H3766>down<s%> and <S%H5307>fallen<s%>: but we are <S%H6965>risen<s%>, and stand <S%H5749>upright<s%>.
